text: Parvin E'tesami (March 17, 1907 â€“ April 5, 1941; ) is an Iranian poet. She was daughter of Yosuf E'tesami, Iranian poet and writer. She started poetry when she was 9. Alladin Pazargadi translated her works from Persian into English in 2000. Category:Persian poets Category:1907 births Category:1941 deaths
title: Parvin E'tesami
